description: Insufficient input validation in Intel(R) AMT in Intel(R) CSME before version 11.8.60, 11.11.60, 11.22.60 or 12.0.20 may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially execute arbitrary code via physical access.

product.name: Intel(R) CSME, Server Platform Services, Trusted Execution Engine and Intel(R) Active Management Technology
